metadata.title: Soles Compression Abdominal Binder, Post-Surgical and Postpartum Belly Wrap, Adjustable Belly Wrap Supports Muscle & Skeletal Stability, Unisex, One Size Fits Most
features: Supportive Compression – This ab belt provides comfortable support for abdominal muscles stretched due to surgery, pregnancy, or a C-section.
Comfortable Adjustability – A one-size-fits-most belly wrap for men and women; the Velcro closure lets you find the right comfort level for size.
Relieve Tension & Stress – Ideal for ladies in postpartum recovery, those looking for post-surgical support, or drivers with long drive times, it works for everyone.
Lightweight & Breathable – Great for all-day wear support, it offers cool, compressive comfort that wicks away sweat and moisture.
Post-Surgical Stability – The right binder for patients recovering from a tummy tuck, liposuction, kidney or bladder problems, or hernia surgery.
description: Give your lumbar full support with an adjustable back brace that alleviates pain and back issues. Back pain happens for a variety of reasons, be it old age, injury, or even genetic disposition. Whatever the issue might be, our adjustable lumbosacral back support can help alleviate some of that pain so you can function at home and at work more effectively. Designed using comfortable, adjustable materials and supported by steel, our back support offers a quality frame to protect your back and spine while solidifying your core strength for improved mobility and flexibility. Features of our lumbosacral back support: Adjustable Corset Supported by Steel Form-Fitting and Comfortable S-M: 23-33 inches and L-XL: 33-53 inches Supports Back Injuries and Spinal Abnormalities Reduces Pain and Supports Core Strength Click “Add to Cart” above and alleviate chronic back pain while supporting your core strength, back muscles and your spine.
331 S Beverly Dr. Beverly Hills CA 90212
